articles.title: Tesla Q3 2025 Update
articles.summary: Tesla's official Q3 2025 financial report, detailing record vehicle deliveries and energy storage deployments. Key financial highlights include a GAAP operating income of $1.6 billion and a GAAP net income of $1.4 billion.

articles.title: Tesla (TSLA) Q3 2025 Earnings Report
articles.summary: CNBC's report on Tesla's Q3 2025 earnings, highlighting that the company's revenue was $28.10 billion and adjusted earnings per share were 50 cents. Automotive revenue was reported at $21.2 billion.

articles.title: Key Takeaways from the Tesla (TSLA) Q3 Earnings Call and Financial Results
articles.summary: This article from Tesla Oracle provides a breakdown of Tesla's Q3 2025 performance, focusing on revenue growth. The energy sector saw a 44% year-over-year increase, while the automotive business grew by 6% year-over-year.

articles.title: Tesla Inc (TSLA) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance's summary of Tesla's Q3 2025 earnings call. The article notes a 29% sequential increase in automotive revenue, an increase in automotive margins to 15.4%, a record free cash flow of approximately $4 billion, and total cash and investments exceeding $41 billion.
